ocean.question: I wiggle and swim. I am little and orange. What am I?

hints.text: 🐠 I live in the ocean.
🥕 I am the color of a carrot.
🖐️ Dory is one!

ocean.question: I am big and blue and salty. Boats float on me. What am I?

hints.text: 💧 I'm made of water.
🚢 Ships sail on me.
🐳 Whales live in me.

ocean.question: I have eight arms and live in the sea. Who am I?

hints.text: 🐙 I use my arms to grab things.
🎨 I can squirt ink.
💙 I'm an invertebrate.

ocean.question: I am a home for fish and other sea creatures. I'm colorful and made of rock-like things. What am I?

hints.text: 🐠 Many animals live here
🧱 They grow underwater.
🌈 They come in different colors.

ocean.question: I have a shell and move very slowly on the sand. What am I?

hints.text: 🐌 I am a gastropod.
🏠 I carry my house on my back.
🏖️ I love the beach

ocean.question: I am a very big sea animal with thick, blubbery skin. People hunt me for food sometimes. What am I?

hints.text: 🧊 I live in a very cold area.
🦷 I have tusks.
🦭 I am a mammal.

ocean.question: I have a hard shell, and I swim in the sea. I'm slow and steady. What am I?

hints.text: 🐢 I lay eggs on the beach.
🟢 I can live to be very old.
🍕 Some soups are made from me.

ocean.question: I'm a very large animal that lives in the ocean and spouts water in the air. Who am I?

hints.text: 🗣️ I communicate by singing songs.
🐳 I am a mammal.
🌊 I can be blue or grey.

ocean.question: I’m a sea creature with a pointy nose and lots of sharp teeth. People are often scared of me. What am I?

hints.text: 🦈 I am a predator.
🔪 I have rows of teeth.
🌊 I swim in all the oceans.

ocean.question: I live in the ocean and I look like a star. What am I?

hints.text: 🌟 I have five arms (usually).
🖐️ I can grow back an arm if I lose one.
🌊 I live on the bottom of the ocean.

plant.question: I am green and grow in the ground. Sometimes I'm tall and have pretty colors. What am I?

hints.text: 🌱 I need water to grow!
☀️ I like to feel the sun.
💐 You can pick me and give me to someone you love.

plant.question: I am big and strong with a trunk and many leaves. Birds like to build nests in me. What am I?

hints.text: 🐿️ Squirrels like to climb on me.
🌳 I give you shade on a sunny day.
🍁 My leaves can change color in the fall.

plant.question: I am long and orange, and bunnies love to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🥕 I grow underground.
🐰 I am orange, but bunnies also like my green leafy top.
🥗 You can eat me in a salad.

plant.question: I am a small plant that grows on the ground and feels soft under your feet. What am I?

hints.text: ⚽ You can play on me.
🐄 Animals like to eat me.
🏡 People have me in their yard.

plant.question: I have thorns and beautiful flowers, but you need to be careful when you touch me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌹 I am often red, pink, or white.
🥀 My petals smell very sweet.
🖐️ Watch out for my pointy parts!

plant.question: I am a tall plant with yellow seeds that you can eat. You can also pop me!

hints.text: 🌽 I grow in a field.
🍿 When heated, I become a yummy snack!
💛 I am the color of sunshine.

plant.question: I grow on a vine, and I am round and juicy.  I am often used to make wine or juice.

hints.text: 🍇 I can be green or purple.
🍷 I am a sweet snack and can be used to make juice.
✨ I grow in bunches and are great for a snack.

plant.question: I am a big, round, orange vegetable that people carve during Halloween.

hints.text: 🎃 I have seeds inside.
👻 People put candles inside me to make a scary face.
🥧 You can make a pie out of me!

plant.question: I am a tall, skinny plant with a fluffy white top. People use me to make clothes.

hints.text: ☁️ My fluff is soft like a cloud.
👕 My fibers can be spun into thread.
👩‍🌾 I grow in warm places and need lots of sunshine

plant.question: I am a plant with leaves that people dry and use to make a warm drink.

hints.text: ☕ People like to drink me in the morning or when it's cold.
🌎 I am grown in different countries around the world.
🌿 Some people add milk or sugar to me.
